class.name: rbt_baxter_controllers/RbtBaxterPositionController
class.description: The RbtBaxterPositionController tracks position commands for the entire Baxter arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: rbt_baxter_controllers/RbtBaxterVelocityController
class.description: The RbtBaxterVelocityController tracks velocity commands for the entire Baxter arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: rbt_baxter_controllers/RbtBaxterEffortController
class.description: The RbtBaxterEffortController tracks effort commands for the Baxter joints. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: rbt_baxter_controllers/RbtBaxterHeadController
class.description: The RbtBaxterHeadController tracks position commands for the Baxter head. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: rbt_baxter_controllers/RbtBaxterGripperController
class.description: The RbtBaxterGripperController tracks gripper commands for the Baxter end effector. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
